title: Pax Romana
description: Episode 7 of Series “Il Etait Une Fois L'homme” (= “Once Upon a Time Man”). In 52 BC, Julius Cesar defeats Vercingetorix and conquers Gaul. Soon the Pax Romana will expand to all of Europe and the British Isles. This episode presents an overview of Roman civilisation with a particular focus on civil and military engineering.  Credits: Director, writer, Albert Barille ; photography, Jean-Louis Karcher ; art direction, Philippe Landrot, Rene Borg ; graphic research, Jean Barbaud. Cast: Roger Carel, Francine Laine, Pierre Trabaud, Henri Djanik [original French narration].
related_objects: Series; S002033; Il Etait Une Fois L'homme = Once Upon a Time Man; Active; 1978
